title: Ep. 589 Why Silly Liberal Boycotts Are Actually a Good Thing
description:
In this episode - Another liberal boycott is about to blow up in their faces. https://twitchy.com/gregp-3534/2017/11/12/did-you-nuke-your-keurig-you-may-be-in-luck-sean-hannity-will-give-away-500-coffee-makers/   This piece debunks another silly liberal myth about the “rich” and taxes. https://t.co/ryFoq3PbSv   The Obamacare tax penalty is the real problem in the tax code. https://t.co/UditBWRQj4   Liberals keep lying about what happened in Kansas to argue against tax reform. http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/as-congress-debates-tax-reform-dont-be-deceived-by-tax-myths-about-kansas/article/2640397   Did the Trump dossier trigger an FBI investigation? http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/byron-york-did-dossier-trigger-the-trump-russia-probe/article/2640470?utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Examiner%20Today&utm_source=StructureCMS  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
